title: How to Make Walnut Paste

steps.headline: Blend or process the freshly shelled walnuts.
steps.description: Add the Parmesan, garlic, lemon juice and zest and blend for 20 seconds.

steps.headline: Add the olive oil gradually and blend to the consistency of a paste.
Season with the salt, pepper, paprika and nutmeg.
Use the paste.
steps.description: It will keep for up to 5 days refrigerated and covered.

text: Blend or process the freshly shelled walnuts. Add the Parmesan, garlic, lemon juice and zest and blend for 20 seconds. Add the olive oil gradually and blend to the consistency of a paste.  Season with the salt, pepper, paprika and nutmeg. Mix in well. Use the paste. It will keep for up to 5 days refrigerated and covered.
